pages.text: 37|52|delke niyeay tha  tae anak pitchea sthet knongchamnaom anak  del mean chomnue( nung kar rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh) ryy
37|53|tae nowpel del yeung slab  haey yeung ban klaytowchea dei ning chhaoeng haey noh  tae puok yeung pitchea trauv ke tabasnang( nouv tongveu  teanglay robsa puok yeung) ryy
37|54|mneak noh ban niyeay tiet tha  tae puok anak kheunh( mi td ph ke  d  robsa yeung kal now lokey) der ryyte
37|55|ruochamk ke ka tow rokmeul  pelnoh ke srabte kheunh mi td  robsa ke sthetnow kandal nork cheu hi m .
37|56|ke kaban niyeay tha  saum sbath nung a l laoh tampit  anak staerte thveu aoy khnhom thleak knong nork( dauch anak) .
37|57|haey brasenbae kmean nie k meat nei mcheasa robsakhnhom te  khnhom pit  chea sthet knongchamnaom anak del trauv ke bramoul( thveutearounakamm)chea  minkhan .
37|58|( anak thansuokr ban suor knea tha)  dau che  neah tae puok yeung min slab
37|59|krawpi kar slab robsa puok yeung chealeukdambaung( knong lo- ke y)  haey puok yeung minmen chea anak del trauv ke thveutearounakamm  te ryy
37|60|pitabrakd nasa  nih haey chea chokchy da thomtheng .
37|61|daembi chngban dauchnih  dau che  neah chaur aoy banda anak del sang ampeu  la khetkham sang ampeula( nowknong lokey) .
37|62|tae avei( chamneiahar) delke triem aoy( anak thansuokr)  noh la cheang  ryy daem hsaoe k kou m( del chea chamnei puok nork) la cheang
37|63|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bangkeut vea( daem hsaoe k kou m)chea  tearounakamm samreab puok bampean .
37|64|pitabrakd nasa  vea kuchea daemchheu del doh chenhpi bat nork  cheu hi m .
37|65|phle robsa vea hakbeidauchchea kbal puok shai t n .
37|66|dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa puokke ku trauv briphok ampi daemchheu noh  haey poh robsa puokke penh tow daoy vea .
37|67|banteabmk  pitabrakd nasa  puokke nung trauv phoektuk kdaw  bamphot leay cheamuoy vea .
37|68|kraoyomk  pitabrakd nasa kanleng vilotralb robsa puo ke  ku chhpaoh towkean nork cheu hi m .
37|69|pitabrakd nasa  puokke ban brateahkheunh chidaunchitea robsa  puokke v nge  v ng .
37|70|ruoch puokke branhab branhal anouvotd tam koumrou robsa( chidaunchitea)  puokke .
37|71|haey chea karpit nasa  puok chomnean moun pheakochraen ban v nge  vng  moun puokke towtiet .
37|72|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban chattang knongchamnaom  puokke( puok chomnean moun) nouv anak dasatuen promean cheachraen .
37|73|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) meulchoh  tae lotthophl chong  kraoy robsa anak del trauv ke dasatuen promean teangnoh yeang dauch me  d ch
37|74|leuklengte banda khnhom robsa a l laoh del mean chetd brisotth  bonnaoh .
37|75|haey chea karpit nasa  nuo h ban buongsuong som pi yeung pel  noh yeung kuchea anak phdal chamleuy da brasaer bamphot .
37|76|haey yeung ban sangkroh ke  ning krom kruosaear robsa ke pi  kroh m h nd reay( tukchomnn) da thngonthngor .
